title: Liver, bacon and mushroom pie
ingredients: ['FILLING', "400g lamb's liver", '2 tbsp plain flour', '100g unsmoked back bacon', '2 tbsp olive oil', '150g shallots, peeled and cut into wedges', '200g carrots, peeled and diced', '150g button chestnut mushrooms', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '1 tsp finely chopped fresh rosemary', '300ml lamb or vegetable stock, hot', '2 tbsp dry sherry', 'SUET PASTRY', '100g self-raising flour', '75g fresh white breadcrumbs', '1 tsp finely chopped fresh rosemary', '50g ‘light’ shredded vegetable suet']
